name: Miraculo Island (itch)
description:
『 Not all miracles are good. 』

Genre: Adventure/Visual Novel (Mystery/Horror/Slice of Life)

Playtime: ~8 hours (multiple endings)

Summary: You play as Nicholas, a guy who lost his memory due to an accident two years ago. Because of this you have no friends, no clear objective in life and have gotten behind in what academic matters refer.
The school has deemed necessary (mandatory) for you to attend an eight days seminar in an island located somewhere in the Atlantic Ocean.
Here you will meet five other students to partake in varied activities under special supervision. But strange things begin to happen...

What you thought would be eight boring days in a remote island will become your worst nightmares. Is the place haunted? Is someone else out there to get us? Is there another motive they brought us here? Depends on you and your mates to survive in this mysterious place.

Mature content description. This game contains the following:
Animated Blood, Language, Violence, Alcohol Reference, Suggestive Themes
